job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Technical Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Senior Technical Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving AI tools for customer support rather than developing or engineering AI models. While it mentions AI training and fine-tuning, the primary role appears to be technical support augmented by AI, not core AI development.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the process of adapting or adjusting AI models, which falls under the scope of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools, especially in the context of integrating them into existing systems, aligns with software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the limitations of current AI systems and applying human judgment to resolve issues, which requires understanding the business context of customer support.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand how to combine human and AI efforts to meet business objectives (exceptional customer support).

technologies.justification: Refers to the underlying generative models that power AI tools.
Indicates the output of generative models.
Fine-tuning is a process often facilitated by specific libraries or frameworks for LLMs.
This broadly refers to the ecosystem of tools and frameworks used for AI development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the need to quickly learn and adapt to new products and systems.

soft_skills.phrase: if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes the importance of self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills in overcoming technical challenges.

soft_skills.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
soft_skills.justification: Requires analyzing complex issues and applying practical solutions where AI is insufficient.
Suggests taking initiative to enhance existing systems, indicating ownership and a drive for improvement.
